data.message: Why can't I go live on fb...my app is up to date according to fb....I use an android. ..come on people. ...

replies.message: Hi Errol. Thanks for reaching out. If you're not seeing this option after uninstalling and reinstalling your app, please feel free to share your interest in Live here: http://bit.ly/2fYGWSZ. -Brittany
Just not happening. ..did everything you told me....hope it's not phone
Is there any way you can block people from stealing someone's profile and picture on Facebook? If not you really need to look into that and try to fix it because a lot of people are getting hacked

Hey Linda. Fake profiles created to imitate real people aren't allowed on Facebook. If someone created an account pretending to be someone you know, please report it by following these steps: http://bit.ly/2lot1bO. -Joe
